suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for procedure_source_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.procedure_occurrence` as record2 where procedure_occurrence.procedure_occurrence_id = record2.procedure_occurrence_id and procedure_source_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset.concept_ids_suppression`))

suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for procedure_concept_id
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.procedure_occurrence` as record2 where procedure_occurrence.procedure_occurrence_id = record2.procedure_occurrence_id and procedure_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset.concept_ids_suppression`))

suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for modifier_concept_id
